page.title: 04LLANGURIG, COMMUNICATIONS.
page.content: The village has its own automatic telephone exchange.The{S.T.D.}code is {05515. Previously a manned exchange was operated in the post office. The postal sevice is{satisfactory. The small post office,{which is under {threat of closure,}has facilities for posting letters, parcels and air mail letters.People can collect their {pensions}and{family allowances,}and they can use the giro and national savings facilities. The cost of a first class stamp is 17 pence and a second class stamp is 13 pence.
